SELECT *, TO_CHAR(s.sub_paydate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS formatted_paydate,
CASE WHEN r.review_seq IS NOT NULL THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END AS review_written FROM subscribe s JOIN customer c USING (cust_seq) JOIN product p USING (product_seq) LEFT JOIN review r USING (sub_seq) WHERE c.cust_seq = #{cust_seq} AND ( 'all' = #{period} OR ('1' = #{period} AND sub_date >= CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '1 month') OR ('2' = #{period} AND sub_date >= CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '2 months') OR ('3' = #{period} AND sub_date >= CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '3 months') ) ORDER BY sub_seq DESC;

select * from subscribe join customer using (cust_seq) join product using (product_seq) where cust_seq = #{cust_seq} and sub_date + (sub_period || ' month')::INTERVAL >= current_date and sub_cancel = false order by sub_date + (sub_period || ' month')::INTERVAL
